overview: Empire is a movie about having fun riding your bike New York City. In the tradition of BMX and skate movies, Empire follows New Yorkâ€™s best fixed gear riders and a few special out-of-town guests in and out of traffic all over New York City.  Inspired by MASH and Lucas Brunelle, Empire is the first full-length fixed gear action sports feature shot entirely with New York City.Featured riders include Tom Lamarche, WONKA, Dwaine, Yatika Starr Fields, Dagga, John Prolly, Kai Perez and surprise guests.
tagline: A movie about having fun riding your bike in the city
title: Empire
